page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar item button list object

property.name: type
property.description: The type of item. For a button list item the value must be "button-list".

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the item.

property.name: autoHideDisclosure
property.description: Whether or not to hide the disclosure when the button list is clicked. The default is "auto" which will close the disclosure if the A5.ControlBar.showDisclosure methods settings autoHide property is set to true, but leave it open if it is false. A value of "always" will always hide the disclosure. A value of "never" will never hide the disclosure.

property.name: actions
property.description: Bindings of events to named actions. The property names are those of events that occur on the item. Values are "click", "down", "up", "downhold", "contextclick", "dblclick" and "swipe". The value of these properties is then name of the action to fire when the event occurs. If an action named "back" should fire then the user clicks the item, the JSON would be "{click: 'back'}".

property.name: settings
property.description: The settings for the button.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use for the button.

property.name: multiple
property.description: Whether or not to allow multiple values to be selected.

property.name: allowNullSelection
property.description: Whether or not to allow no value to be selected.

property.name: fill
property.description: Whether the buttons should fill the width or height of the button list container. Values are "none", "width" or "height".

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the element that contains the button list.

property.name: nullSelectionClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that contains the button list when no value is selected.

property.name: button
property.description: Settings for buttons in the button list.

property.name: keepPressed
property.description: Whether or not to keep buttons pressed when they are selected.

property.name: layout
property.description: The layout of a button in the button. Values are "text", "icon", "text icon", "icon text", "text/icon", "icon/text", "text-icon" and "icon-text".

property.name: style
property.description: The inline CSS to put on a button in the list.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on a button in the list.

property.name: firstClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the first button in the list.

property.name: lastClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the last button in the list.

property.name: middleClassName
property.description: The class name to put on any button in the list that isn't the first or last.

property.name: hoverClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a button in the list when the user hovers over it.

property.name: pressedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a button in the list when the user presses it.

property.name: disabledClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a button in the list when it is disabled.

property.name: iconStyle
property.description: The inline CSS to put on the icon in a button in the list.

property.name: iconClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the icon in a button in the list.

property.name: bind
property.description: Bindings for the item.

property.name: value
property.description: The path to the property in the data that the value for the button list is stored. The property must be an array if the button list supports multiple selection.

property.name: data
property.description: The path to the property in the data in which the button definitions for a button list are stored. The property must be an array. If the buttons only use text layout, the data can be an array of strings which will be both the display, and value of the button in the list. Otherwise the array must contain objects that specify the "html", "icon", and "value" to use. It may also specify "iconHover", "iconPressed" and "iconDisabled". Disabling buttons can be done by setting a property named "disabled" to a value of "true". Hiding buttons can be done by setting a property of "show" to a value of "false".

property.name: show
property.description: The show expression for the item.
